body: @darkdef would you please take a look?
In function getValue you use subquery?

The function selects the value from another table and in this case it also uses a subquery.
I removed the subquery from the function and only returned a plain value but the result is the same.
I think the function call causes the problem here.

Added key to computed column in table schema and usage for generate query (OUTPUT INSERTED without computed columns)

body:
The OUTPUT got SQL syntax error if the column name is MSSQL keyword e.g key. 

Please add '[]' around the "OUTPUT INSERTED.id" => "OUTPUT INSERTED.[id]"

https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/blame/master/framework/db/mssql/QueryBuilder.php
Line 490
              $columns[] = 'INSERTED.' . $column->name;
=>
              $columns[] = 'INSERTED.' . $this->db->quoteColumnName($column->name);
It's right. Need fix. I will do it

issue.title: Error while using transactions: attempt to initiate a new Adaptive Server operation with results pending

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

issue.body:
I use mssql, version 14.0.3223.3. My config ```'dsn' => 'dblib:version=7.2;host=10.199.??.???;dbname=web_trunk;charset=utf8'```, ```'driverName' => 'mssql'```

I updated Yii from 2.0.36 to 2.0.43 version and got next error in my code. ```SQLSTATE[HY000]: General error: 20019 Attempt to initiate a new Adaptive Server operation with results pending [20019] (severity 7) []``` (https://monosnap.com/file/sTRWKER32VCSbfW3Qb1lK2N5NWRgjZ). I use a transaction. Inside transaction I call a procedure and use save() method of ORM. The error occures in ORM. I found out that error happens due to #18214, #18287 changes. If I return old mssql\QueryBuilder::insert() method (https://monosnap.com/file/Ezs0BvzIBciNgglsT7KjFOL9nlvzD2), from version 2.0.37 -- it works fine.



### Additional info

| Q                | A
| ---------------- | ---
| Yii version      | 2.0.43
| PHP version      | 7.4.13
| Operating system | Windows 10, docker container, php:7.4-fpm
